scenario.name: UAC OPTIONS
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:1234;phone-context=national@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp;phone-context=national@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: Asterisk <sip:1234;phone-context=national@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 OPTIONS Contact: sip:sipp;phone-context=national@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Asterisk Testsuite Content-Length: [len]
